mapper.select: SELECT bb.fund_code AS fund_code, --基金代码 bb.fund_name AS fund_name, --基金名称 bb.day_increase AS day_increase, --日涨跌幅% bb.nav_date AS nav_date, --净值日期 bb.unit_nav AS unit_nav, --单位净值 bb.acc_unit_nav AS acc_unit_nav, --累计净值 bb.nums AS nums --产品净值记录数 FROM (SELECT aa.*, ROWNUM AS rn FROM (SELECT tfn.*, COUNT(1) OVER(PARTITION BY tfn.fund_code) AS nums FROM t_fund_nav tfn WHERE tfn.fund_code = #{fund_code} ORDER BY tfn.nav_date DESC) aa WHERE ROWNUM <= #{end_number}) bb WHERE bb.rn >= #{start_number}
